title: Extreme Package Design: The Art Edition of the "Calatrava - Complete Works" Book
description: If you're a fan of the architect Santiago Calatrava, you can buy Taschen's "Calatrava – Complete Works 1979 – Today" coffee table book for $200. The nearly-700-page tome is loaded with text and images including both photos and his original watercolor sketches. If you're a Calatrava superfan, you can pony up for the special Art Edition of the book. This version, of which only 300 were produced, comes with two signed lithographs and a pretty on-brand package design by Calatrava himself: The Art Edition is a tad pricier at $2,500.
author: Rain Noe

html:
Extreme Package Design: The Art Edition of the "Calatrava - Complete Works" Book

Porch pirates wouldn't know what to make of it

If you're a fan of the architect Santiago Calatrava, you can buy Taschen's "Calatrava – Complete Works 1979 – Today" coffee table book for $200. The nearly-700-page tome is loaded with text and images including both photos and his original watercolor sketches.

If you're a Calatrava superfan, you can pony up for the special Art Edition of the book. This version, of which only 300 were produced, comes with two signed lithographs and a pretty on-brand package design by Calatrava himself:

The Art Edition is a tad pricier at $2,500.
